EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for downloading Beyond Speed: Enterprise CI/CD and DevOps
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for downloading the 415 Research report Beyond Speed: Enterprise CI/CD and DevOps <[[https://content.pivotal.io/analyst-reports/451-research-beyond-speed-cicd]]>.
If you would like more information, or have any questions about how Pivotal can assist your organization on its cloud-native journey, don’t hesitate to reach out by contacting us here <[[https://pivotal.io/contact]]>. Thank you, The Pivotal Team
